channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Google Maps just got a big upgrade for your skiing trip – and it’s all thanks to a backlash from snowsports lovers
item.description: Ski trails, lodge markers, and lifts have returned to Google Maps – and these are the resorts that are currently available to view.

item.title: Rockstar says that the IWGB union 'have no idea who was in this Discord' as the GTA 6 developer continues to claim that the firings of former devs were over leaks of 'specific game features'
item.description: Rockstar Games has once again addressed accusations of union-busting from the Independent Workers Union of Great Britain (IWGB), claiming that it fired over 30 Grand Theft Auto 6 developers for sharing company secrets in a Discord channel.

item.title: Apple déploie la bêta d’iOS 26.3 : voici les deux nouveautés importantes
item.description: D'habitude, une mise à jour d'iOS sert à vous garder dans l'écosystème. Avec la bêta d'iOS 26.3 sortie ce lundi, Apple fait exactement l'inverse : elle vous offre une porte de sortie native vers Android.

item.title: Flash sale — get $35 off a refurbished PS5 at Back Market for a limited time
item.description: Refurbished retailer Back Market is offering an additional $35 off PlayStation 5 consoles for a limited time.

item.title: L’enceinte Devialet Phantom Ultimate 108 dB, icône de l’audio haut de gamme, profite d’une offre rare pour les amateurs de son d’exception
item.description: Devialet est une marque connue pour le raffinement de ses enceintes Bluetooth. Raffinement que vous retrouvez sur la Phantom Ultimate 108 dB disponible à 2 720 euros au lieu de 3 200 euros sur Boulanger.

item.title: Enfin une app Disney+ pour le Meta Quest, mais Apple garde le meilleur morceau
item.description: Vous avez un Meta Quest 3 ? Vous pouvez enfin arrêter de passer par le navigateur web buggé pour regarder Andor. Disney+ déploie son application officielle.

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong's upcoming DLC pack will be free for all players
item.description: One of 2025's splashiest games, Hollow Knight: Silksong, is getting its first major DLC expansion, developer Team Cherry announced in a blog post. The nautically-themed Sea of Sorrow update will come to the moody Metroidvania some time in 2026, and better still, it will be free for all players. The DLC will include "new areas, bosses, tools and more," the developer wrote. There aren't a lot of clues to the gameplay in the short trailer below, but the four shots definitely relay the vibe. The first shows what looks like fishing tackle, then we see something (or someone) on a tomb-like wooden p...

item.title: 9 Best Electric Scooters (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested two-wheelers will help you scoot scoot scoot around town.

item.title: The Anker Laptop Power Bank soothed my (self-inflicted) battery anxiety
item.description: For the longest time, I refused to upgrade my work-issued MacBook. I was leery of the hassle, and would much rather hang on to an aging Intel-powered laptop than have to transfer files, set up apps and sign in to accounts all over again. What did it matter if my notebook barely lasted long enough to cover an iPhone launch? My petty brain blamed it all on external factors (like being forced to use a MacBook instead of a PC), and left me dripping in stress as I watched the power levels dip down to zero at many of the live events I attend every year. So when I saw the Anker Laptop Power Bank was ...

item.title: 'We've got to stop the panic' – Sapphire pushes for calm on RAM crisis fears and predicts price stability next year
item.description: RAM prices are skyrocketing due to the current AI boom, but Sapphire's PR manager encourages consumers to stay calm and avoid panic buying.

item.title: Ofcom says it’s investigating Three and BT to see if they ‘failed’ customers during this year’s big outages
item.description: The BT, EE, and Three networks collapsed to such an extent in June and July that regulators are getting involved.

item.title: I asked AI to help me stop being a Grinch this Christmas — and it actually gave good advice
item.description: With Christmas on the horizon, I'm stressed about the holidays not living up to my expectations – maybe AI can help

item.title: The Morning After: Roomba maker iRobot files for bankruptcy
item.description: iRobot, the company that brought robotic vacuum cleaners to homes and popular culture, has filed for bankruptcy. It plans to sell all assets to its primary supplier, the Chinese company Picea Robotics. Investors “will experience a total loss and not receive recovery on their investment” if the deal is approved, iRobot said. The company didn’t discuss how the move might affect its employees in the US or elsewhere. Amazon dropped its $1.7 billion acquisition of the company last year after a veto threat from European regulators, leaving the Roomba maker with no other option. Political scrutiny c...

item.title: Liquidation de 60 Millions de Consommateurs : pourquoi la décision du Sénat provoque la colère
item.description: C'est un tournant majeur pour la défense des consommateurs. Malgré une forte mobilisation et un coût de fermeture contesté, le Sénat a validé la liquidation de l'INC. Une décision qui ouvre la voie à la privatisation de 60 Millions de Consommateurs, marquant la fin de son statut public historique.

item.title: Ces drones que la Nasa entraîne dans le désert pourraient changer la façon d’explorer Mars
item.description: Après le succès du petit hélicoptère Ingenuity, la Nasa prévoit la suite de son exploration de Mars avec des drones. Ces engins ont déjà été testés dans le désert des Mojaves, en Californie, en espérant un départ prochain pour la Planète rouge.

item.title: The UPerfect Delta Max touchscreen monitor offers so much potential, but I found it wasn’t quite as straightforward as it should have been in my tests
item.description: Stuck for space? Then these dual-stacked monitors offer a decent amount of screen real estate while taking up minimal desk space.

item.title: 5 Years Later, AirPods Max Feel as Bougie as Ever
item.description: With a price that will make you cry iPhone-sized tears, the AirPods Max still feel like one of the best status symbols you can buy.

item.title: ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Creators Lift the Lid on That Not-So-Surprising Finale Cameo
item.description: The Stephen King adaptation wrapped up its first season Sunday night on HBO with a little slice of fan service.

item.title: Aluminium OS: Everything We Know About the Chromebook Successor
item.description: Google has officially acknowledged the upcoming merger of Android and Chromebooks, and it may be coming in 2026.

item.title: The ‘mad rush’ to install solar panels before tax credits run out
item.description: Ed Murray has been in the solar business long enough to remember the bloodbath of 1985. That's when President Ronald Reagan ended Jimmy Carter-era solar tax credits meant to decrease US reliance on fossil fuels following the 1970s oil crisis. "It was a sad time," says Murray, who is president of the trade group California […]

item.title: Everbloom built an AI to turn chicken feathers into cashmere
item.description: Everbloom has also developed a chemical process to transform waste fibers and feathers into upcycled materials that resemble everything from polyester to cashmere.

item.title: « C’est urgent ! » : comment Android veut vous aider à répérer un appel important
item.description: Une prochaine mise à jour d'Android va donner la possibilité à ses usagers de signaler un appel comme urgent à partir de l'application Téléphone.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for December 16, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: Ces écouteurs sans fil Xiaomi deviennent enfin intéressants grâce à une baisse de 30 % sur Amazon
item.description: Les Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 sont des écouteurs ouverts qui plaisent pour leur confort et leur bonne autonomie. S'ils ne sont pas sans défauts, ils deviennent une option bien plus séduisante pour qui cherche de bons écouteurs à petit prix maintenant qu'ils passent de 79 euros à 54 euros.

item.title: The first teaser for Avengers: Doomsday has leaked online — and it contains a massive spoiler about the new Marvel movie
item.description: Marvel is fighting to keep details about Avengers: Doomsday's four teasers under wraps after a major leak.

item.title: The top-rated AirPods Pro 2 drop to a super-low price in Back Market's limited-time flash sale
item.description: The Apple AirPods Pro 2 are perfect for Apple users and now you can own a refurbished pair for just $135.

item.title: Adieu Face ID ? L’iPhone pliant miserait tout sur une finesse record et une caméra invisible
item.description: Attendu pour 2026, le futur iPhone pliant miserait tout sur la finesse, quitte à abandonner Face ID au profit d'un capteur d'empreintes latéral.

item.title: NYT Mini crossword answers, hints for December 16, 2025
item.description: Answers to each clue for the December 16, 2025 edition of NYT's The Mini crossword puzzle.

item.title: IPTV et streaming illégal : ce pays européen voulait s’attaquer aux VPN, il fait machine arrière
item.description: Au Danemark, le ministre de la Culture a voulu mettre fin au streaming illégal de matchs de football, en prévoyant d'interdire les VPN dans certains cas. Mais face au tollé, l'homme politique a finalement décidé de supprimer de son projet de loi toute référence aux VPN.

item.title: A whole host of DualSense PS5 controller color variants are still on offer, with huge savings in the UK and US for the Holiday season
item.description: These PS5 DualSense deals aren't to be missed. Get heavy discounts in the US and the UK, on a whole host of color variants.

item.title: The Trump administration wants to take the seat belts off AI. That’s a catastrophic mistake
item.description: State-led regulation doesn’t slow growth. It spurs it. President Trump just signed an executive order attempting to block states from regulating AI an unprecedented step that would strip states of the ability to protect their residents at a moment of extraordinary technological volatility. This move is overwhelmingly unpopular (polling has found that Americans oppose AI moratoriums by a 3-1 margin), and certain to be litigated in the courts. But it is also likely to achieve the exact opposite of its stated goals—deepening mistrust and slowing AI adoption at a time when America wants to win the...

item.title: AWS CEO Matt Garman Doesn’t Think AI Should Replace Junior Devs
item.description: The head of Amazon Web Services has big plans to offer AI tools to businesses, but says that replacing coders with AI is “a non-starter for anyone who’s trying to build a long-term company.”

item.title: Asus dévoile le premier écran 5K Dual Mode au monde, mais vous ne pourrez peut être pas en profiter
item.description: Asus vient d'annoncer un écran Dual Mode d'un nouveau genre pour convenir à toutes les catégories de jeux sur PC.

item.title: Marathon will launch in March 2026 at $40 and will include a roadmap of free gameplay updates
item.description: Bungie has shared new details about its long-awaited extraction shooter Marathon. The game will now be released in March 2026 for $40.

item.title: So long Google dark web report – I’d never even heard of you
item.description: Google is shutting down its dark web report tool, but I doubt it will be missed.

item.title: The days of the em dash being a ChatGPT giveaway are over — it’s time to bring it back
item.description: The days of the em dash being a ChatGPT giveaway are over — it’s time to bring it back

item.title: Acheter un smartphone en 2026 ? Mauvaise idée
item.description: Acheter un nouveau smartphone en 2026 pourrait réserver de mauvaises surprises. Les prochains modèles risquent en effet de coûter plus cher, tout en étant moins bien équipés.

item.title: Voici la meilleure offre pour glisser Légendes Pokémon Z-A sur Switch 2 sous le sapin de Noël
item.description: Légendes Pokémon Z-A est la dernière aventure en date de la fameuse franchise, à retrouver pour 47,99 euros au lieu de 69,99 euros sur Nintendo Switch 2.

item.title: Neuroinclusive workplaces won’t happen without this one shift: emotional accessibility
item.description: Employees bring their nervous systems, histories, and identities into work. Leaders need the emotional literacy to recognize what neurodivergent colleagues are really experiencing. In recent years, organizations have launched neurodiversity and mental health initiatives with the best of intentions: to raise awareness, launch employee resource groups, and create a culture where team members embrace diverse neurotypes and learn to coexist in an ecosystem....

item.title: Mise à jour Volvo : un gros retard qui cache une inquiétude sur nos vieux processeurs
item.description: Il va falloir prendre votre mal en patience. Alors que Volvo promettait une refonte totale de son interface pour la fin 2025, le constructeur vient d'annoncer un report de dernière minute. Les 2,5 millions de voitures concernées ne verront pas la couleur du nouveau logiciel avant l'année prochaine.

item.title: Adam Scott’s ‘Hokum’ Teaser Is the Freakiest 40 Seconds You’ll See All Day
item.description: The 'Severance' star dives into supernatural horror in the next film from 'Oddity' director Damien McCarthy; it hits theaters May 1.

item.title: Solo VC and Lovable investor Neil Murray raises third Nordic-focused fund
item.description: The Nordic Web closes $6M Fund III.

item.title: Why ‘shift sulking’ may be 2026’s next big work trend
item.description: This phenomenon afflicting hourly employees is only expected to grow in today’s 24/7 gig economy, according to experts. As we count down to the last days of the year, we are looking ahead to what may be one of the next big work trends of 2026: shift sulking.

item.title: Calvin McDonald’s departure is a problem for Lululemon
item.description: McDonald tripled Lululemon’s revenue to $11 billion and transformed it into a global powerhouse. It’s unclear who can better steer the brand through the choppy waters ahead. When Calvin McDonald was appointed CEO of Lululemon in 2018, the activewear brand was a cult brand. But it had the potential to become a retail giant.
